attributes.action: Force Microsoft to make Vista compatible with XP software
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Microsft's new OS "Vista" is deliberately designed to make current XP software obselete. In the present spiralling costs crisis, the last things that commerce and the man in the street need is the expense of purchasing new software and licences in order to continue working productively and  avoid an even greater recession.

Gordon, Please tell Bill Gates to wake up and realise that he will eventually join us all on Skid Row if we all abandon Microsoft.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
